name: Jumping Squid Game
description:
Jumping Squid Game is a test your luck game, where you simply have to choose: left or right. The game is totally randomized every time and there is always a chance that the next step you take will be your last! Good thing you have five tries! But can you remember the steps that were safe? 

Try out the "Tower Mode" in which you have three floors of platforms that upon breaking will drop you to a lower one, which might also be too weak and break! Who knows!
